snippet.title: Shadow of Memories / Destiny | Full Game Longplay Walkthrough No Commentary
snippet.description:
Shadow of Memories / Destiny (Full Game Movie Playthrough) - Longplay Gameplay Walkthrough Lets Play Part 1, Ending. Full HD 1080P 60fps No Commentary OG Original XBOX / PS2 / PC (ENDING - A) .Captured on OG XBOX.

P.B. Horror Gaming's Rating - ★★★★☆

** PB Horror Gaming. The Original Network for your Survival Horror Gaming needs! **

Shadow of Destiny 4K/Widescreen Walkthrough ► https://youtu.be/BN5_lxpBVIo

► SUBSCRIBE to my channel here - https://www.youtube.com/pbhorrorgaming
► Twitter - https://twitter.com/PB_HorrorGaming

□ Game Description □
"Set in a fictional German town named Lebensbaum (Life's Tree), Shadow of Memories revolves around a 22-year-old man named Eike Kusch, who dies in the beginning of the game from being stabbed after leaving a small diner. However, he is resurrected by Homunculus, a Djinn or Genie, who offers to send him back in time to prevent his death."

Developer - Konami.
Publisher - Konami.
Release - 2001.
Platforms - PS2/OG XBOX/PC
